title: Proactiv Solution Original Repairing Lotion 2 oz
description:
Step three of our Proactiv Solution daily essentials, this light, luxurious lotion contains 2.5% finely milled benzoyl peroxide to penetrate deep beneath the skin's surface to help stop acne at its source. 
Size: 2 oz

title: Sally Hansen Hard as Nails Hard as Wraps, Clear, 0.4 Fluid Ounce
description: Powerful acrylic protection instantly seals and hardens nails in 1 easy step. Patented breakthrough formula provides an instant, long-lasting, wrap-like surface for fragile, soft, torn, chipped or cracked nails.

title: Neutrogena Clear Pore Cleanser/Mask, 4.2 Ounce
description: Clear Pore Cleanser/Mask is a breakthrough acne-fighting formula that can be used two ways as a daily cleanser or as a mask.  This dermatologist-tested formula has the acne-fighting power of Benzoyl Peroxide to kill bacteria and treat existing breakouts. Cooling intensity builds as it penetrates deep into pores. Use as a daily cleanser to kill bacteria. Or use as an intensive mask for Deep CLEANsing and extra oil control.

title: Mimi's Diva Dryer by Aquis Microfiber Hair Turban, Patented Design, White
description: Diva Dryer is made of Aquitex.  Aquitex is a super-absorbent microfiber material that dries a girl's hair quicker than an ordinary hair towel.  Dry your hair in half the time!

title: Moist 3 Minute Miracle Deep Conditioner 8 Fl Oz (Pack of 4)
